nodes.text: Imber was an individual who served as a member of the Believers, a Sith cult that was based in the Cularin system.

Imber was part of a group of Believers who were sent to the planet Caarimon during the time of the Clone Wars, to place some transmitters on fault lines on the surface of the world, as part of a plot to release a virus that was fatal to the Caarite species. Along with the Believers Garit, Urna and Willus, Imber attacked the Heroes of Cularin, a group of freelance agents who were investigating the plot.

Imber was created by Morrie Mullins and appeared in the role-playing supplement Belly of the Beaast. During the adventure, the players role-play as the Heroes of Cularin and the number of Believers that attack the player characters on Caarimon varies, depending upon the role-playing tier of the player characters. Imber is only present if the player characters are ranked at a middle or upper tier level. The scenario does not identify Imber's gender or species.
